title: Coolpad
description: This is not a showcase project, rather a simple conceptual project developed in the beginning of academic programming and one of the first GUI Applications I've developed. As the name suggests, it's a notepad with cool features (if you consider early coding days ;) } So this project includes a notepad, that helps to encrypt text using traditional character shifting. and does basic save edit, and of course comes with a total notepad vibe.

title: Resistor Calculator
description: A fun project done to ease the Physics Lab resistor count as part of Bachelors course

title: Resistor Calculator Android
description: A fun project done to ease the Physics Lab resistor count as part of Bachelors course

title: Password Manager
description: A password manager project built in .NET Core. It's a basic application I built to play with .NET Core framework. Again, basic character shifting algorithms implemented.

title: CGPA Calculator
description: A simple CGPA Calculator for Hobby

title: Power timer
description: A windows application to manipulate windows Power using powershell commands embedded into .NET Desktop

title: Chat App
description: A socket IO based Basic Chat application. Developed to learn SocketIO implementation with NodeJS.

title: Birthday Surprise
description: A jquery based simple application, built to wish friends and family on their birthday
